title: Champion Skin Refund
body: Hey Guys! So I am looking for someone at Riot to help answer this question for me. I sent in a request to refund a champion skin but was unable to do so since I used the skin in a game and it was classified as "Used Content". This is extremely peculiar to me as I thought used content was things like IP and XP boosts. Can someone enlighten me as I have scoured the great big web of mystery and can not find the light at the end of the tunnel. Thank you.

replies.body: Each account is provided 3 refunds tokens to return unintended content within 90 days, per our [Refund Guidelines](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).  If there are no refund tokens, such as in this case,  we can certainly try to advocate and make exceptions whenever we can; however, in this case it doesn't sound like we were able to.  If you have any concerns about this, please feel free to let your specialist know in your ticket who will be happy to clarify!

Ah thank you for your response, however the response I received was still round-about, I've been playing league for years, I believe since 2012-2013 and still feel like im in the dark. If he would of told me upfront that I didn't have any refund tokens, which I still don't know where to access that information, it would of been a lot better, however the way the message was written, seemed that I still have a token or tokens but since I used the skin in a game, it is refundable.
So you still have a token?
